mapper.select: SELECT indeicator_name,range_00,range_01,range_02,range_03,range_04,range_05,range_06, range_07,range_08,range_09,range_10,range_11,range_12,range_13,range_14,range_15,range_16, range_17,range_18,range_19,range_20,range_21,range_22,range_23 FROM t_normal_model_detail_info INNER JOIN t_normalcheckmetadata_test ON t_normal_model_detail_info.indeicator_code = t_normalcheckmetadata_test.indeicator_id WHERE t_normal_model_detail_info.indeicator_code = #{indexid} AND t_normal_model_detail_info.cell_code="广州天河区地铁三号线体育西D-ZLW-115"
